description: The AP_CLAIM_DX table contains one record for each diagnosis on an accounts payable claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record for this diagnosis.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the diagnosis for this claim record. For example, if a claim has two associated diagnoses, two AP_CLAIM_DX records will be generated: one with a line number of 1, the other with a line number of 2.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the diagnosis associated with this record.

columns.name: AP_DX_NUM
columns.description: The number of the diagnosis associated with this record.

columns.name: AP_DX_QUALIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The qualifier related to the diagnosis associated with this record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: AP_DX_POA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Present on Admission (POA) for the diagnosis code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


1 - Unreported/Not used


Y - Yes


N - No


U - Unknown


W - Clinically undetermined

columns.name: AP_DX_RANK
columns.description: The rank of this diagnosis compared to the other diagnoses on the claim.
